extendedInfo.description: Spell Check: Test Alarming results from a Spelling Society survey: we are a society that can't spell! Try our Spell Check: Test and see whether you are one of the 25% of adults who reckons they have a problem with spelling, or the 65% who refuse the use of a spell-checker. Spell Check: Test will show you whether your spelling is a recommendation, or an embarrassment. Spell Check: Test â How well do you know English spelling rules? Test your skills with the questions of our spelling games!

reviews.title: This is a wickd app!!!
reviews.comment: Waow...so i\'m aweful in spelling?! I\'m gonna have to take a back seat now till i tick every button right- i\'m going to be practicing daily, gosh so shameful i can\'t spell...WHAT?!  I love this app, well done team. I hope i spelt all right!
reviews.author: Funkey Shon

reviews.comment: Enjoyed playing with my bf however it made me feel much worse than I originally thought I was at spelling! Just downloaded it so I\'m a new user, so far so good\tEnjoyed playing even though it made me realize I\'m not as great of a speller as I once thought!
reviews.author: Melissa Elliott

reviews.title: Enjoy
reviews.comment: I enjoy playing this game.  Feel a little dumb but i need to get back on track with my spelling.
reviews.author: Katherine Demps

reviews.title: Words are Hard to Figure out
reviews.comment: At least I tryed to spell some words! It was Good on Words,But,some were easy!
reviews.author: Gloria Tingle

reviews.title: Good / bad
reviews.comment: Well it fairly good if u say the words that u want to spell. But some words it does nt hear correctly. Couldnt get anywhere with writing words and checking them. U say no ads but there is some. Needs a bit of work. But it does help a bit.
reviews.author: Sandy Teddy
